QuestData.Title: Home Again, Home Again
QuestData.Description:
I can't thank you enough for the help here! You showed up just in time.
Here is Elijah's sausage order. Don't worry, it's just regular sausage- nothing questionable.
Now if you'll excuse me I have to see to my workers.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Elijah Eggleton in Fallhaven.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Elijah Eggleton in Fallhaven.
